overview_of_class: Continuous time Markov processes, vector independence and the multivariate normal distribution, second-order and stationary processes, stochastic differential equations. The 311 sequence covers more topics at a faster pace and in greater depth than does 310; students may not receive credit for both 311-3 and 310-3.
name: MENU:  Probability and Stochastic Processes
subject: MATH
